newsitem.title: USA: Crown Cork to take $0.31 restructure charge.
newsitem.headline: Crown Cork to take $0.31 restructure charge.

text.p: Crown Cork & Seal Co Inc said on Tuesday that it would close six manufacturing locations in the United States, generating an after-tax charge of $0.31 per share to third quarter earnings.
The charge, estimated at $43.3 million, also covers other restructuring activities, primarily in Europe, the company said in a statement.
Crown said the plants slated for closure belong to its Constar subsidiary and that the move was aimed at improving its plastic beverage container business.

"Annual savings relating to all of these actions, when fully implemented, are expected to be approximately $20 million, or $0.14 per share on a fully diluted bases," the packaging products company said.
